Name: durability
Desc: How many times the item can be used before breaking

Name: harvestLevel
Desc: Up to what level of obstacle can it break

Name: lscript
Desc: Script to run on left click when holding this item

Name: rscript
Desc: Script to run on right click when holding this item

Name: damage
Desc: Amount of damage done to enemies

Name: solidFuel
Desc: Signifies a solid furnace fuel source (value doesn't matter, it just checks for the existence of this tag)

Name: burnTime
Desc: How many frames this item will fuel a furnace
